articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Jangjagang Machine Tool Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Jangjagang Machine Tool Plant
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the Jangjagang Machine Tool Plant.
					He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Thae Song, Kang Kwan Il, Hwang Pyong So, Hong Yong Chil, Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Jong Chon and Kim Thaek Gu.
					
					He looked round the room dedicated to the revolutionary history of the plant.
					
					Looking at a photo of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il displayed at the room, he recollected with deep emotion the day he visited the plant accompanying Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Seeing the sample products of the plant, he learned in detail about their technical specifications and quality.
					
					He dropped in at the press shop to acquaint himself with material cutting.
					
					Then he looked round the automated shop.
					
					Watching the automated process made up of flexible manufacturing line operated by CNC-based machine tools and robots, unmanned material carrier, automated storehouse, etc., he was very pleased to see the production efficiency, quality of products and manufacturing environment which underwent remarkable improvement despite such complicated conditions as preparations for technology and production and alternation in product composition.
					
					He said with satisfaction that this shop is a model shop in which Kim Jong Il's idea of pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology which calls for automating all production processes has been embodied and a precious legacy left by him.
					
					The construction of the automated shop at the plant helps boost production capacity incomparably with it in the past and improve the quality of machines, he said, adding it is profitable to let this plant produce in an intensive manner the same types of machines made in different plants.
					
					All sectors and units should positively realize automation in the future as required by the age of knowledge-based economy, he said, noting that to this end it is necessary for other units to feel the urgency of automation in practice as is the case with this plant and the Jangjagang Machine Tool Plant should be regarded as a standard for realizing automation.
					
					Factories and enterprises should regard it as a main line in technological updating to realize automation, he said, adding it is the consistent policy of the WPK to totally free the workers from manual work. 
					
					He had a significant picture taken with officials at the production site of the automated shop honored with Kim Il Sung Prize.
					
					He gave precious instructions on waging a dynamic drive to update and scientize all production processes on a higher level on the basis of the experience and foundation whereby the plant has automated the machine processing shop. He took such benevolent step as settling the issue arising in sprucing up the plant.
					
					He had a photo session with the employees of the plant, expressing expectation that they would register great achievements in production and construction true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Makes Historic Speech after Enjoying Art Performance with Workers of Jagang Province
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Makes Historic Speech after Enjoying Art Performance with Workers of Jagang Province
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, enjoyed an art performance given by the Moranbong Band, together with workers of Jagang Province.
					Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Thae Song, Kang Kwan Il, Hwang Pyong So, Hong Yong Chil, Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Jong Chon, Kim Thaek Gu and Ryu Yong Sop, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK.
					
					Prior to the performance, he had a photo session with the workers of the Kanggye General Tractor Plant.
					
					Put on the stage were colorful numbers including female chorus "Song of National Defence", light music "To a Decisive Battle", female solo and pangchang "For the Younger Generation", female duet and pangchang "What Is Life?", female chorus "Song of Artillerymen" and light music "At a Go".
					
					The performers sang high praises of the undying revolutionary feats Marshal Kim Jong Un has performed by  leading the drive for building a thriving nation while making ceaseless on-the-spot guidance and the indomitable spirit of the service personnel and people of the DPRK demonstrating the might of the great Paektusan nation, united close around him.
					
					After the end of the performance, he made a historic speech before the workers in Jagang Province.
					
					"Going round different industrial establishments in Kanggye City this time, I could see the workers all out in the drive to devotedly embody the spirit of the 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea in hearty response to it", he said. He extended thanks to the workers of the Kanggye General Tractor Plant, the Kanggye General Precision Machine Plant and the Jangjagang Machine Tool Plant on behalf of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					He said that he drew great strength and hardened his resolution to more successfully make the revolution in the future together with the reliable workers, while visiting different plants associated with the undying leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					He noted that he attached great importance to different plants in Kanggye City, calling upon their workers to give steady continuity to the proud tradition in which they have devotedly defended the party and the leader with increased production.
					
					He advanced militant tasks facing the workers in Jagang Province, underlining the need to keep the production going at high rate at plants and dynamically push back the frontiers of latest science and technology and thus put the modernization and scientization of the production processes on a higher level, establish cultured practices in production and life as required by the Songun era and steadily push forward the work to improve supply service.
					
					He expressed expectation and belief that the workers in Jagang Province would successfully carry out their honorable tasks, hoping that only glory would be always in store for them.

articles.title: Annual Meeting of British Friendship Society with Korea Held
articles.content:
Annual Meeting of British Friendship Society with Korea Held
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the British Friendship Society with Korea was held in London on June 15.
					It reviewed the society's activities last year and discussed the orientation of this year's work.
					
					Vice-Chairman of the society Dermot Hudson in his report at the meeting said this year is a very important year for the movement for solidarity with the Korean people.
					
					July 27 marks the 60th anniversary since the Korean people defeated U.S. imperialism in the Fatherland Liberation War, he noted.
					
					The society will send its delegation to the celebrations of the anniversary, he said, adding that the Korean people have recently registered remarkable achievements in socialist construction.
					
					The U.S. imperialists are escalating aggression moves and sanctions to stifle the DPRK, he said, and went on: It is our duty to extend positive solidarity to the Korean people.

articles.title: Head of DPRK Delegation Clarifies Stand on Economic Construction
articles.content:
Head of DPRK Delegation Clarifies Stand on Economic Construction
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The head of the DPRK delegation to the 38th Conference of the General Assembly of the UN Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) made a speech on June 19. 
					Saying that FAO has successfully fulfilled its responsibility and role for two years, he said that food shortage and poverty continue worldwide despite the international efforts. 
					
					He stressed the need to focus attention on the following problems to ensure food security by increasing world agricultural production to meet the MDGs (millennium development goals) of the UN:
					
					It is important for each country to shape correct agricultural policy befitting its own specific conditions and increase the agricultural production by its own efforts. 
					
					International political circumstances and social and economic conditions should be provided for the developing countries to increase grain production and ensure food security. 
					
					FAO should decisively enhance the role to fight starvation and achieve food security. 
					
					Now the DPRK is in its dynamic drive to build an economic power under the wise guidance of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					The DPRK government is steadily putting great efforts to the work of improving the people's living standard by hastening economic construction. 
					
					The DPRK set agriculture as one of the major targets for economic construction. It directs state efforts into it and takes measures to increase grain production by putting agricultural production on higher scientific and intensive basis. 
					
					It also strengthens material and technical help for rural areas to solve food problem by its own efforts. 
					
					It is developing the Sepho tableland into a grass-land for a large stockbreeding base while activating the work to increase the acreage of land under cultivation through tideland reclamation and land realignment. 
					
					The DPRK's efforts for economic construction will make contributions to the work for world economic development and food security and will be of significant contributions to the international community's efforts to implement the MDGs of the UN and action programs of the world summit for food security.

articles.title: Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy in Myanmar
articles.content:
Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy in Myanmar
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Yangon on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					The delegation of the party visited the DPRK embassy on June 17 and laid a floral basket before portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Service Personnel, People Visit Susan-ri House of Class Education
articles.content:
Service Personnel, People Visit Susan-ri House of Class Education
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Many people from all walks of life, including servicepersons and schoolchildren, have visited the Susan-ri House of Class Education with the approach of June 25, the day of struggle against the U.S. imperialists.
					For three years after its opening, the house has been visited by more than 519 000 people from at least 4 000 institutions.
					
					On display there are evidence and relics laying bare shuddering atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists in the place in the period of the temporary strategic retreat of the Korean Peopleâ€™s Army during the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: More Rallies Held at Industrial Establishments, Co-op Farms
articles.content:
More Rallies Held at Industrial Establishments, Co-op Farms
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Employees of factories and enterprises and members of co-op farms in various parts of the country held rallies to vow to devotedly carry out the important tasks set forth by the dear respected Kim Jong Un in his historic appeal and to respond to the letter sent by the Sepho tableland reclaimers to the people across the country.
					The appeal sent by Kim Jong Un was conveyed at the rallies.
					
					Then the letter was read out.
					
					The speakers at the rallies of employees of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, the Kujang Area Coal Mining Complex, Hochongang Power Station and other enterprises underlined the need to follow the fighting spirit and work style displayed by soldier-builders in creating new a-match-for-hundred offensive speed in the 21st century and "Masikryong Speed" and bring about great innovations and leaping progress in the production.
					
					The employees of the Chongchongang Garment Factory, the Sunchon Knitwear Factory and the Hamhung Disabled Soldiers' Essential Plastic Goods Factory at their rallies vowed to provide the people with good-quality products and carry on the dynamic work to put the production processes on a modern and scientific basis. 
					
					Agricultural workers of the Tongbong Co-op Farm in Hamju County, the Ranjong Co-op Farm in Kosan County, the Paeksan Co-op Farm in Kumya County and the Subok Co-op Farm in Sunchon City at their rallies underscored the need to manure and cultivate crops as required by the Juche farming method, set up the ring-shaped rotation production system and overfulfill the production plans including grain, vegetable, livestock products and fruits.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on "Masikryong Speed"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on "Masikryong Speed"
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The new historic advance for creating the "Masikryong Speed" being made in the DPRK is a grand general offensive and death-defying drive to build in a shortest period a thriving country where  the people enjoy all blessings, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a bylined article.
					The "Masikryong Speed" is, in essence, the new speed of socialist construction in the dear respected Kim Jong Un's era and the standard speed of building a thriving socialist nation in the 21st century, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					The drive for creating the "Masikryong Speed" is the sacred one to inherit the history and tradition of a great surge provided under the leadership of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and glorify them on a new high stage.
					
					The speed is characterized by the unprecedented speed of great leaping progress created by the service personnel in the spirit of devotedly carrying out the policies of the Workers' Party of Korea and their attack spirit being displayed on the highest level and an all-people speed of general charge being created competitively on all fronts and units of socialist construction.
					
					It is also the one designing and creating everything as a model of the times to be impeccable after 100 and 500 years while ensuring the maximum speed.
					
					To create the "Masikryong Speed" is the worthwhile struggle to shatter the moves of the U.S. and its followers to stifle the DPRK, and to give fuller play to the independent dignity of socialist Korea and the spirit of its prosperity.
					
					The drive to create the speed is a historic advance being made legitimately under the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea which is firmly defending and glorifying the feats leader Kim Jong Il performed in building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Urge Is Dissolution
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Urge Is Dissolution
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Students under the Federation of University Students in the 21st Century of south Korea staged an action in Seoul on June 21 calling for the dissolution of the Intelligence Service (IS). 
					The students held a press conference before the Kwanghwamun Plaza denouncing the IS for building up public opinion in its favor and interfering in politics. They staged a demonstration march toward Chongwadae.
					
					Though the riot police block the way, they strongly confronted, chanting the slogans "Start state investigation into IS's interference in politics!", "Dissolve IS!" and "Arrest Won Se Hun!"
					
					As the demonstrators arrived in the Dong-A Ilbo Office, the police surrounded them.
					
					The police arrested all the demonstrators that day.

articles.title: Quake Jolts North Jolla Province, S. Korea
articles.content:
Quake Jolts North Jolla Province, S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- A 2.3-magnitude earthquake occurred in the waters 19 km northeast of Ochong Island in Kunsan, North Jolla Province Saturday, according to south Korean KBS.
					An earthquake was also reported from almost the same area on Friday.
					
					From June 5 earthquakes measuring 2.1-2.6 degrees on the Richter scale occurred ten times in the above-said waters.

articles.title: Korean Students in Japan Protest against Moves of Discriminating against Korean Schools
articles.content:
Korean Students in Japan Protest against Moves of Discriminating against Korean Schools
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Students of Joson University and Korean high schools under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan held a protest action outside the building of the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan on June 21. They denounced the Japanese government for excluding only the Korean schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools.
					They heightened fighting spirit, chanting slogans laying bare and denouncing the Japanese authorities' moves of discriminating against the Korean schools.
					
					They handed over to the ministry a document calling on the Japanese government to ensure the Korean students' right to learn.

articles.title: DPRK's Proposal for High-Level Talks with U.S. Favored by German Expert
articles.content:
DPRK's Proposal for High-Level Talks with U.S. Favored by German Expert
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Dr. Christoph Rehman, an expert in international affairs of Germany, posted on website "Fair International News" an article supporting the DPRK's proposal for holding high-level talks between authorities of the DPRK and the U.S.
					The author said:
					
					The spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK issued a crucial statement to propose high-level talks with the U.S.
					
					The crucial statement elicited the policies of the U.S. which should be certainly overcome for lasting peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The U.S. administration is claiming that in order to defuse tensions on the Korean Peninsula the DPRK should show its will for denuclearization first and stop "provocation" and "threat".
					
					It is none other than the U.S. which has aggravated the tensions on the peninsula while resorting to the moves for stifling the DPRK with ceaseless nuclear threat and sanctions.
					
					The DPRK openly and clearly expressed its stand that it wants talks with the U.S., real talks to achieve peace and security in the region including the U.S. mainland.
					
					The Korean Peninsula is now in frozen state. Many years have passed since the end of the Cold War but the Korean people in the north and the south are still suffering from the Cold War.
					
					It is not certain whether the U.S. will positively approach the DPRK's broad proposal for holding the high-level talks for real peace.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Day Marked in Various Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Day Marked in Various Countries
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Myanmar and lectures in Guinea and Ecuador in the period from June 16 to 18 to mark the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					Displayed at the venues of functions were photos documenting his undying feats.
					
					Also on display were famous works of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					The secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar said as follows:
					
					We are looking back with deep emotion upon the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il who strengthened and developed the WPK into a party of President Kim Il Sung and an invincible steel-strong party.
					
					The protracted, shining history of the WPK marks days of brilliant achievements in which the whole party and army and all the people have met all sorts of challenges by the hostile forces and accelerated socialist construction in firm unity under the leadership of the great leaders.
					
					Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, is leading the WPK to victory.
					
					The future of the WPK and the Korean people led by him is rosy.
					
					The vice-chairman of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association in Guinea praised the immortal party-building exploits by Kim Jong Il.  Even though he passed away, the WPK is holding him in high esteem as its eternal general secretary, he noted.
					
					The president of the Canar Provincial Institute for Friendship and Solidarity with the DPRK of Ecuador said that Kim Jong Il's party-building feats would shine forever with the socialist cause.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Cambodian Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Cambodian Party Leader
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was the great father who treated Great King Norodom Sihanouk as his real younger brother and bestowed great benevolence on him.
					Norodom Rasmey, chairman of the Funcinpec Party of Cambodia, said this on June 17 when meeting with DPRK Ambassador to Cambodia Hong Ki Chol who paid a courtesy call on him.
					
					He recalled with deep emotion that he, together with his father Great King Norodom Sihanouk, visited the DPRK several times and was honored with the audience of President Kim Il Sung. He went on:
					
					The great king could achieve national reconciliation and unity and glorify his life as the father of the Cambodian nation entirely thanks to Kim Il Sung.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il paid deep attention to the great king.
					
					The Funcinpec Party is pleased with the relations with the Workers' Party of Korea developing on good terms.
					
					It is an important task for our generation to continue strengthening the friendly relations between the two countries provided by Norodom Sihanouk and Kim Il Sung.
					
					I am convinced that the friendly relations between the Funcinpec Party and the WPK and between the Cambodian and Korean peoples will be everlasting.
					
					We fully support all policies of the DPRK.
					
					I express belief that the WPK and the Korean people would register greater successes in building a thriving nation under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Personages of Brazil, Syria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Personages of Brazil, Syria
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Personages of Brazil and Syria issued statements on June 16 and 17 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					The chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il said:
					
					He developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, the father of socialist Korea, as required by the era and the developing revolution.
					
					The logic of the Songun politics formulated by him in an original way helps firmly protect the sovereignty of the country and the nation under the conditions in which the imperialists' policy of strength has become evermore undisguised.
					
					His idea and theories serve as the immutable truth and the banner of eternal victory for the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people making general advance toward the final victory for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					His feats in party building have become an eternal engine powerfully encouraging the Korean people's cause of socialism.
					
					Saber Ballul, head of department of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus, said that Kim Jong Il will be immortal in the hearts of progressive mankind aspiring after independence.
					
					He paid high tribute to Kim Jong Un who is leading the DPRK to victory under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea and the Songun idea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats in Party Building Lauded by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats in Party Building Lauded by Foreign Newspapers
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups to mark the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					The Indian paper Defence and Humanity on June 16 dedicated its one whole page to articles illustrated with his photo.
					
					An article titled "Kim Jong Il, feats in building Workers' Party of Korea" said:
					
					He performed distinguished feats in party building, leading the WPK for nearly half a century. The greatest feat performed by him was that he turned the WPK into the integral whole transparent in ideology and a party which has achieved firm unity and cohesion. Another feat he performed was that he built the WPK into the genuine mother party serving the people. His feats in party building will shine long with the WPK winning one victory after another.
					
					The June 16-30 issue of the Lao paper Noum Lao in an article titled "Eternal general secretary of WPK" said that the feats he performed in party building serve as the eternal engine powerfully propelling the socialist cause of the Korean people.
					
					The June issue of the British paper Line of March carried an article praising his feats in party building, illustrated with his portrait.
					
					It said that the Korean people will beat back the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK and certainly make great achievements in building a thriving nation under the leadership of the WPK, which is led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Appeal Supported by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Appeal Supported by British Organizations
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on June 10 in support of "Let Us Usher in a Fresh Heyday on All the Fronts of Socialist Construction by Creating the Speed on Masik Pass", the appeal sent by the dear respected Kim Jong Un to all service personnel and people across the country.
					The appeal reflects his loving care for the people to have them enjoy wealth and comfort under socialism, the statement said.
					
					He said that the world's leading skiing ground should be built unconditionally within this year so that laughing of socialism and hurrah of the Workers' Party of Korea reverberate in Masik Pass area, it noted.
					
					Only he can put forward such a bold and grand plan, it pointed out.
					
					Indeed, the construction of the Masik Pass Skiing Ground is a giant work which can be carried out only by Juche Korea led by him, it said.
					
					The Korean people will work great miracles in the spirit of at one go, it noted.
					
					The Korean people will more dynamically push forward the building of a thriving socialist nation on the revolutionary principle of self-reliance and achieve greater successes on all fronts in hearty response to his historic appeal, it added.

articles.title: WPK Praised by Indonesian Party Leader
articles.content:
WPK Praised by Indonesian Party Leader
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Nurdin Purnomo, chairman of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia, issued a statement on June 13 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					He was the distinguished leader who led the WPK along the road of victory for a long period and the greatest man who devoted his all to achieving the prosperity of Korea and global peace and accomplishing the human cause of independence, the chairman said, and went on:
					
					The WPK has grown invincible since he started to work at its Central Committee. Great leader makes great party and country.
					
					There are many parties in the world but there is no party that can match the WPK in the aspects of organization, discipline and unity.
					
					The cause of Kim Jong Il is being firmly carried forward by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					The WPK will demonstrate its dignity as the invincible party forever as it is led by Kim Jong Un possessed of matchless grit and pluck and tested leadership ability.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked by Foreign Websites
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked by Foreign Websites
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Organizations and institutions of different countries posted on their websites special write-ups to mark the 13th anniversary of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					The France-Korea Friendship Association posted an article on June 14:
					
					June 15, 2000 was a historic day on which the north-south joint declaration for peace and reunification of Korea was published.
					
					The north and the south of Korea published the joint declaration and opened up the June 15 era of reunification thanks to the energetic activities conducted by leader Kim Jong Il to carry out the behests of President Kim Il Sung for national reunification.
					
					The north and the south laid the foundation for the peaceful reunification of the country by removing misunderstanding and mistrust and achieving great unity of the nation and its co-prosperity under the uplifted banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					
					The France-Korea Friendship Association will wage a more dynamic movement for solidarity to praise Kim Jong Il who devoted his all to defusing tensions and achieving reconciliation on the Korean Peninsula and realizing the cause of national reunification, and to support the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article titled "Monuments calling for reunification" on the same day:
					
					The Korean nation was divided into the north and the south owing to the foreign forces since the Second World War. The DPRK has waged a persistent struggle for reunification for nearly seventy years. In this course peculiar monuments reflecting desire for reunification have been built in the country.
					
					The article introduced in detail the United Front Tower and the Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification.
					
					The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, Kim Jong Il Library in Ecuador and the Juche Youth Group of Ecuador on June 4 and 5 posted articles supporting the joint declaration, denouncing the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces for their anti-reunification moves and calling upon the south Korean authorities to opt for implementing the joint declaration in the spirit of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: Nepali Paper on Circumstances of Korean War
articles.content:
Nepali Paper on Circumstances of Korean War
Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The Nepali paper Jana Sata on June 15 carried an article titled "How did the Korean war start" with the approach of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					The Korean war broke out on June 25, 1950 but it started as the U.S. pushed forward the war preparations in a planned way after occupying south Korea under the pretext of disarming the Japanese army in 1945 with the ambition for world hegemony, the paper said.
					
					Citing data on this, the paper went on:
					
					The U.S. plan for the Korean war was decided with the unanimous approval of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff in January, 1950. MacArthur in a secret meeting with Syngman Rhee in February 1950 ordered him to invade north Korea before July. Dulles, who flew to south Korea as a special envoy of Truman on June 17, 1950, issued a secret order to spread misinformation that north Korea invaded the south Korean army first and, at the same time, invade the north all of a sudden.
					
					The U.S. took full measures for camouflage and deception on the eve of the war. It choreographed the movements of high-ranking officials on the pretexts of weekend, trip, dinner, etc., trying to conceal its true colors as a provoker of the war.
					
					The Korean war was started by the U.S. This is proven by the confession made by a staff officer of the 17th Regiment of the south Korean puppet army in those days. He said "June 24, 1950 was Saturday but officers were banned from going out and ordered to be on alert for war order. On the night of June 24 they received a secret order to start a military action against north Korea by crossing the 38th parallel at the dawn of June 25."
					
					The U.S. instigated the south Korean army to start a surprise invasion of north Korea at the dawn of June 25, 1950.
					
					This is how the Korean war (1950-1953) which was called the grimmest war since the Second World War was started.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Combinado de Maquinas de Precision de Kanggye
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Combinado de Maquinas de Precision de Kanggye
Pyongyang, 23 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Combinado de Maquinas de Precision de Kanggye.
					Ante todo, el Mariscal estuvo en el museo de la historia revolucionaria.
					
					Viendo el diario de la direccion en el terreno de los Grandes Hombres sin pares del monte Paektu, recordo con emocion el proceso del desarrollo orgulloso de dicha fabrica dirigida en el terreno en 19 veces por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, en 17 por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y en 2 por la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk.
					
					Se entero de capacidades de las maquinas producidas por la fabrica y vio los articulos de primera necesidad.
					
					En el taller de elaboracion de materiales se cercioro de las caracteristicas tecnicas y eficacias economicas de los equipos y en el taller de automatizacion CNC hizo conocimiento del estado de modernizacion de la produccion de herramientas.
					
					Recorriendo el taller de montaje y el de acabado pregunto la cantidad de la produccion diaria y dijo que deben asegurar a los obreros el favorable ambiente de produccion.
					
					Dio las tareas que se presentan ante la fabrica.
					
					La fabrica debe cumplir sin falta el plan mensual y trimestral y hacer bien los preparativos para alcanzar la meta de produccion mas alta.
					
					Debe elevar la eficiencia de produccion, renovar y modernizar los equipos.
					
					Debe desplegar la energica lucha por mejorar la calidad de los productos.
					
					Para el particular, debe analizar profundamente los indices tecnicos de las maquinas de precision desarrolladas en escala mundial, desplegar con animacion el movimiento masivo por la innovacion tecnica para predominar sobre aquellas y librar la labor para introducir la ciencia y la tecnica avanzadas.
					
					Los funcionarios de la fabrica deben prestar gran atencion a cuidar bien la vida de los empleados.
					
					El Mariscal se fotografio junto con los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica.
					
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Thae Song, Kang Kwan Il, Hwang Pyong So, Hong Yong Chil, Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Jong Chon, Kim Thaek Gu y el secretario responsable y el secretario del comite del PTC en la Provincia de Jagang, Ryu Yong Sop y Kim Chun Sop.
